page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelnavigator setpaneldisplay method

argument.name: panel
argument.description: The name of the panel to set display on.

argument.name: display
argument.description: The display state of the panel (true equals show).

page.description: Hide of show a panel in the navigator.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class pObj.setPanelDisplay('h1',false); // hide the panel named "h1" in the panel navigator
